website_summaries.verdict: HP's LaserJet 4200n offers small businesses impressive print quality and relatively fast speeds at a good price. Those who print graphics-intensive documents, though, should look for a faster model.
cons: Slow print speed for mixed text/graphics

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks like new
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace a similar laser printer we've had for years that finally quit working correctly. We decided to get the exact same model (no longer being manufactured) because our Unix server and software is configured for it already. This printer looks like new, even though it was refurbished! Arrived very clean, although they could have used something less messy to pack it in. It was well-packed, but they used lots of Styrofoam popcorn to fill the box. That caused a huge mess trying to unpack the printer. Other than that, everything is working fine and I'm happy I bought this printer from this particular seller. No problems!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Brant

customer_reviews.title: wonderful 10 year old printer
customer_reviews.text: As a semi-retired attorney, I cringed every time I used my very nice home/small business printer to print out 100 pages at a time...(which happens every now and then). So I took a chance and bought this (approximately)10 year old refurbished heavy-duty printer. I had to buy a $35.00 printer/computer cable from radio shack to make it go. But the set-up is just a 'plug and use' and it is wonderful... The 'foot-print' is large, but I just have sitting under the folding table I use as my desk next to my computer. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OldBill

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Printer at Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an HP 4200n. At first, when I plugged it in, I could not get the printer to operate due to an error message, but with prompt expert guidance from the seller, the printer is now working perfectly for my needs (printing on thick archival paper). This printer is exactly what I need. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: but it was built to be a quality workhorse with superior, clear print that that's what it delivers
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE this printer! Yeah, it's used, but it was built to be a quality workhorse with superior, clear print that that's what it delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Another Tigger

customer_reviews.title: quality refrb
customer_reviews.text: Hp 4200 series is a great and fast print this refrb runs great can tell its age by a few discolored panels but that is the only way to tell the was preowned. Have been printing checks with this unit it has never failed good vendor and great printer
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The printer works great and has no problems. It has the built in envelope feeder and bypass tray, so there are no extra parts to purchase. Printing quality is clear and a good quality. No lines or excess toner on the paper. The only complaint deals with programming. Without a booklet or knowledge of the machine, programming can be a little time consuming. We would recommend purchasing this printer as it has been reliable and no problems. Original machine lasted a little over seven years.
customer_reviews.author: Gem1

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: After used the printer for 3 months, I am happy to say that the print quality is no different than a NEW printer. At first I did encounter the grinding noisy, after change the Swing Plate Gear, the noisy did stop. When I open the printer I notice that the inside of the printer was very clean so I assuming that the seller might not aware the problem when shipped. After all, I believe I got a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a total work horse which is exactly what we need.
customer_reviews.author: J. Telesky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this workhorse of a printer for heavy in office use. NO problems whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks brand new
customer_reviews.text: Printer was delivered quickly and looks almost new. Working great and would buy another. First page jammed because I did not see some tape on a roller that I should have removed. After that works great.
customer_reviews.author: bender0209

customer_reviews.title: For the price what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, it was what I expected, I found a better one and parted this one out.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN MASTERSON

customer_reviews.title: Wow....This Is A Serious Piece Of Machine
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super quick, which I love. It is huge, do not be fooled by the look online, like I was. Packaged & wrapped up securely. Looks good from what I see so far. Like new. Wish it had come with a manual. If I have any updates on it, I will post at later date. Pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: V1

product_meta.title: HP Laserjet 4200 Printer
product_meta.description:
MONOCHROME LASERJET

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The HP LaserJet 4200 printer is the new standard for workgroup printing. This fast versatile workgroup laser printer offers high performance and crisp, clear printing. With numerous paper handling accessories, this printer can be customized for any office. The HP LaserJet 4200 printer provides office workgroups a simple, worry-free means to get their business documents on page.

 Increase your productivity with fast 35 ppm laser printing, even for complex documents, thanks to a 300 MHz processor and 48 MB RAM. Reduce warm up time with the instant-on fuser that delivers first page out in less than 10 seconds. Print sharp, clear laser documents at 1200 dpi at full speed.

 Customize the 4200 to meet your workgroup needs with networking options. Improve productivity and reduce manual intervention with optional additional paper trays and optional paper handling accessories such as a stapler, stacker, and duplexer for two-sided printing.

 Built with HP LaserJet reliability for simple, worry-free printing, the 4200 also supports HP Web Jetadmin for remote installation, configuration, and management from a common Web browser. You'll benefit from walk-up printing features--including private printing, proof-and-hold printing, and quick copy printing.

 Print large volumes of documents without worry with the industry's most reliable engine and a large 150K page per month duty cycle. The unit is backed by a one year warranty.
feature_bullets: Parallel interface, optional networking; PC and Mac compatible

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars22 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
